title: [Self-directed] Personalized Language Education Design Strategy Using MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Language education course exploring personalization potential of MOOCs for professional learners in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze MOOCs-provided data to propose customized content design plans based on learner profiles.
Learners can develop blended assessment tools that accommodate diverse learner levels in alignment with inclusive education principles.
Learners can execute step-by-step strategies to design personalized learning experiences using digital resources in offline environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
